casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Anthony LESANE, Jr. No. 141P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 5, 2017 William A. LeSane, Jr., for LeSane, William A. (Jr.) Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 27th of April 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of May 2017."
